name: dummy
description: ![Chronos logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Chronos2-0/Chronos/master/app/assets/logo2.png) ## Microservices Architecture Microservices architecture for testing [Chronos](https://github.com/oslabs-beta/Chronos), a microservice communication and health visualizer.

scripts.install: (cd books && npm install) & (cd customers && npm install) & (cd orders && npm install) & (cd 'reverse proxy' && npm install)
scripts.clean: (cd books && npm run clean) & (cd customers && npm run clean) & (cd orders && npm run clean) & (cd 'reverse proxy' && npm run clean)
scripts.dev: (cd books && npm start) & (cd customers && npm start) & (cd orders && npm start) & (cd 'reverse proxy' && npm start)
